      • isValidVersion

        public boolean isValidVersion(org.apache.commons.jexl2.JexlContext _jexlContext)
                       throws InstallationException
        Evaluates the JEXP expression defined in expression. If this expression returns true, the definition is a valid version and could be executed.
        Parameters:
        _jexlContext - context used to evaluate JEXL expressions
        Returns:
        true if the definition is valid
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if the JEXL expression in expression could not be evaluated
        See Also:
        expression

      • searchInstance

        protected void searchInstance()
                       throws InstallationException
        Search for given data model type. If an attribute name for the search is defined in searchAttrName, the search is done with this given attribute. If no attribute name is defined (value is null, the method searches for given UUID. The result is stored in instance (or set to null, if not found).
        The search is only done, if no instance is defined (meaning if instance has no value).
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if search for the instance failed
        See Also:
        variable in which the search result is stored (and the search is only done if the value is null), name of the attribute which them the search is done

      • createInDB

        protected void createInDB(Insert _insert)
                   throws InstallationException
        Inserts current instance defined by _insert into the eFaps database without any access check.
        Parameters:
        _insert - insert instance
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if insert failed

      • removeLinksInDB

        protected void removeLinksInDB(Instance _instance,
                   AbstractUpdate.Link _linkType)
                        throws EFapsException
        Remove all links of a specific type from a given object (defined by the instance).
        Parameters:
        _instance - instance for which all links must be removed
        _linkType - type of link which must be removed
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if existing links could not be removed (deleted)
        See Also:
        used to remove all links for given instance with a zero length set of link instances

      • setLinksInDB

        protected void setLinksInDB(Instance _instance,
                AbstractUpdate.Link _linktype,
                Set<LinkInstance> _links)
                     throws EFapsException
        Sets the links from this object to the given list of objects (with the object name) in the eFaps database.
        Parameters:
        _instance - instance for which the links must be defined
        _linktype - type of the link to be updated
        _links - all links of the type _linktype which will be connected to this instance
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if links could not be defined

      • setPropertiesInDb

        protected void setPropertiesInDb(Instance _instance,
                     Map<String,String> _properties)
                          throws EFapsException
        The properties are only set if the object to update could own properties (meaning derived from 'Admin_Abstract').
        Parameters:
        _instance - instance for which the properties must be set
        _properties - new properties to set
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if properties could not be set TODO: rework of the update algorithm (not always a complete delete and and new create is needed)
